name: Pam's Targets
description:
Controls: Move mouse to look around-Left Click Shoot-Esc to pause the game 

A simple quick microgame I made before getting back focusing on bigger projects.

 Slingshot, targets, just break them~ 

Sure is weird there are some random targets in a forest, but it's not like you'll make a fairy angry by breaking them...right?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For more and bigger games   (JRPG, Horror,  Adventure and even more minigames!) please consider to check my Crystal Wish game serie  at my page -> https://xryecho.itch.io/
